summary: Defines the complete set of default configuration values for the Django web framework, covering aspects such as security, database connections, middleware, templates, static files, internationalization, and logging. These defaults are used unless overridden by a project‑specific settings module referenced via the DJANGO_SETTINGS_MODULE environment variable.
business_intent: Provide a comprehensive baseline of framework settings so that Django applications have sensible defaults out‑of‑the‑box while allowing developers to customize behavior to meet the specific needs of their web projects.
